name: Fluffius Maximus
description: A spell that instantly increases the fluffiness of the caster or the target, providing protection from physical and magical attacks.
casting_instructions: Evie wags her tail three times and barks softly, while focusing on expanding her fluff.

name: Barkus Sonicus
description: A powerful sonic bark that can knock back enemies and break magical barriers.
casting_instructions: Evie takes a deep breath and releases a sharp bark, focusing on the target with intense concentration.

name: Waggo Charmus
description: A spell that makes Evie's tail feel like it's wagging twice as fast as usual, though it stays perfectly normal. A favourite for parties and celebrations.
casting_instructions: Evie wags her tail happily while barking once, feeling the magic of joy boost her energy, even though her tail moves the same.

name: Invisible Fetch
description: Evie casts this spell, and it makes her feel like she’s playing fetch with an invisible ball. She runs and plays, but no object actually exists.
casting_instructions: Evie barks twice and pounces forward as if chasing a ball, happily believing in the magic of fetch.

name: Puff of Sparkles
description: A spell that causes the caster to surround themselves with sparkling magic
casting_instructions: Evie spins in a circle and howls, with magical sparkles swirling around her.
